TopicTitle: Map View: any way to speed up the fading

Articles.Content:
Love the new cleaner map view where you  don't see the orbits of ships until you zoom into the planet. Then they fade up nicely.

But the fade up takes way too long. I zoom into a moon and think "Where are all the ships ... oh there they are."

is there a text file I can edit to make that faster?
